titleStmt.title: A supplement to The Morning-exercise at Cripple-Gate, or, Several more cases of conscience practically resolved by sundry ministers
Morning-exercise at Cripplegate. Supplement.
titleStmt.author: Annesley, Samuel, 1620?-1696.

notesStmt.note: A collection of sermons edited by Samuel Annesley who signed "The epistle".
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
